entries.summary: Finished Virtuals Protocol twitter copy and shared doc with Sid & Joel. Joel gave feedback — Vaidik to incorporate and revise. Also has Gravity/ZkSync (e10) assigned but no discussion yet. TTD d6 (DeFi yield strategies) due tomorrow, in drafting.
